title: Quickly learn HTML and CSS by watching a few videos and make two great websites. And Segular links can be shared with anyone.
The nutshell of the popular framework called bootstrap will fry. Then he will make two e-commerce websites with that. What fun!
Six main things about JavaScript, problem solving with JavaScript, interview questions and answers. Even ES6 will make your knowledge useful
There is live calculation of bank deposit, withdraw with JavaScript. Then there is the e-commerce site shopping cart accounting system
The idea of server, loading JSON data by calling REST API, node, mongodb (database), debugging with chrome devtool will be given.
The most important aspect of the course is that a website full of the world's most popular jobs in the JavaScript Framework (React) is shown from scratch to zero.
Complete professional website with React. Database, server side, hosting, payment system, login, routing with 100 % client -ready website will be shown .
If you need work, you will be introduced to Firebase Authentication, TypeScript, Sass, Tailwind, Google Map api and many more.
You will do a total of 12 projects yourself. With our help. We will also show 5 websites. By doing these you will become a full fledged web developer without knowing it.

Within 15 weeks of enrolling, we will create Super Charged Interviewee Club (SCIC) Secret Club with those who seriously complete the course . I will send resume to those with special interview training to get a job as an intern or developer in different companies.
